channel.title: CVE Feed for Pepperl+Fuchs -- ICDM-RX/TCP-DB9/RJ45-DIN
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pepperl+Fuchs -- ICDM-RX/TCP-DB9/RJ45-DIN

item.title: CVE-2024-5849|2024-08-13T12:32:37.130Z -- pepperl%2Bfuchs -- icdm-rx%2Ftcp-db9%2Frj45-din
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker may use a reflected XSS vulnerability to obtain information from a user or reboot the affected device once.

item.title: CVE-2024-38502|2024-08-13T13:28:24.550Z -- pepperl%2Bfuchs -- icdm-rx%2Ftcp-db9%2Frj45-din
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker may use stored XSS vulnerability to obtain information from a user or reboot the affected device once.

item.title: CVE-2024-38501|2024-08-13T13:31:52.009Z -- pepperl%2Bfuchs -- icdm-rx%2Ftcp-db9%2Frj45-din
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker may use a HTML injection vulnerability with limited length to inject malicious HTML code and gain low-privileged access on the affected device.
